message: Module error while trying to update local copy of weekly_cycle/2: failed to set up Google Sheets API: <HttpError 503 when requesting https://sheets.googleapis.com/v4/spreadsheets/1OmcLOB4OvFqmVw6Jq1lxu5fo7FchPBNMM6MFoNgM7r4?alt=json returned "The service is currently unavailable.". Details: "The service is currently unavailable."> (HttpError).
Module error while trying to sync data and config with repo: git command failed: Command '['git', 'add', '.']' returned non-zero exit status 128. (CalledProcessError).

Module error while trying to initialize heating control: failed to interact with node 'system' via get: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='kazanfutes-71b78-default-rtdb.europe-west1.firebasedatabase.app', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /system/.json (Caused by NewConnectionError('<urllib3.connection.HTTPSConnection object at 0xf5732ad0>: Failed to establish a new connection: [Errno 101] Network is unreachable')) (ConnectionError).
